title: Exploring microgel adsorption: synthesis, classification, and pollutant removal dynamics
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9445-9471
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00563E, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Muhammad Arif
Adsorptive property of microgels is reported briefly in this review. Morphology and synthetic methods of adsorbent (microgels) are described. Various adsorption isotherms and kinetic models of adsorption are also discussed.
